p: Habitat (narrative): This hybrid is a terrestrial or lithophytic acaulescent herb with leaves growing in a rosette between 60 to 95 cm long. The apparently sterile, twisted inflorescence is coral-coloured. It prefers dry forest habitat, growing mainly on rocky outcrops from sea level to higher elevations ( Acevedo-Rodriguez and Strong 2005), predominantly in coastal areas less than 400 m above sea level.
